messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Pam's thoughts
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/1/03 2:58:47 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... *~*Elissa Jill*~* unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people Loving partner for life to
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/1/03 2:58:47 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

> I hope that every
> mom who is just starting out considering homeschooling gets as lucky as
> I did and finds their path lit as brightly as mine was.
>
> pam sorooshian
>
> That was beautiful.
*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
